TB_COMMENT_BULLETIN C JOIN TB_BOARD_BULLETIN B ON (B.ID = C.BOARD_ID)
TB_COMMENT_FREE C JOIN TB_BOARD_FREE B ON (B.ID = C.BOARD_ID)
TB_COMMENT_ANONYMOUS C JOIN TB_BOARD_ANONYMOUS B ON (B.ID = C.BOARD_ID)
TB_COMMENT_DEPARTMENT C JOIN TB_BOARD_DEPARTMENT B ON (B.ID = C.BOARD_ID)
